doc.field: he answered questions in place of ceo mark zuckerberg who ignored repeated requests to appear. alan has acknowledged the company has not been without blame and how it has handled various scandals. the united nations environment office has warned the gap is widening between current greenhouse gas emissions and the levels needed to stop catastrophic global warming. the agency says global emissions of heat trapping gases such as carbon dioxide have shown no sides of peaking. it is urging companies to put forward more ambitious national
